attributes.additional_details:
The gaming industry needs to be regulated.

In 2012, the industry made a staggering £1.598bn in the UK alone.

Yet Games companies do very little to help the consumer once a game has been purchased.

Gamer's will be aware that the game quality quickly depletes after the sale, especially with multiplier games.
There are hundreds of complaints being made by consumers about the quality of the the games and the after sales care is none existent from companies.

We need our government to take notice of this injustice. We are spending far too much money on this industry for the companies to just look the other way when the gaming quality depletes.

We need the Gaming industry to be regulated by the government.
